thread.title: Media General to Exchange Information With Nexstar Under Due Diligence
thread.title_full: Media General to Exchange Information With Nexstar Under Due Diligence - WSJ

author: Josh Beckerman
title: Media General to Exchange Information With Nexstar Under Due Diligence
text:
Meredith Corp., which agreed in September to be sold to Media General Inc., said it granted a “limited waiver” allowing due diligence related to Nexstar Broadcasting Group Inc.’s unsolicited bid to buy Media General.
Meredith said it believes due diligence...
